content: Generate a sentence with every word starting with a single letter of the alphabet, starting with m and going in reverse order.

Majestic zebras xylophonically wander through verdant, uncharted territories, swiftly roaming quietly past obscure nations, mysteriously lingering in kind, jovial habitats, gracefully exploring delightful, calming boroughs, amusingly navigating via undulating, tranquil streets, ponderously questioning rustic, serene territories, uniquely venturing through whimsical, ebbing regions, xenially yearning zestfully.
